"Ferocious Dragon Altar Probe":
"<%me>, I found you! You've been making light of
Dragon Altar Exploration, haven't you? If you don't
take these explorations seriously, it causes trouble
for ARKS watchers like me. The second I look away
you're back to your old tricks...As a punishment for all
the things you neglected you have to clear this with an
S rank otherwise you can't say it's cleared!

*Clear on Hard or higher with an S Rank
within 50 minutes or less"

"<%me>、見っけ！
アンタ、龍祭壇の探索をナメてない？
ちゃんと探索してくれないと
アークスウォッチャーの私が困るのよ。
ちょっと目を離すとすぐコレなんだから……
今までほったらかしてた罰として
Ｓランククリアじゃなきゃ
クリアしたとは言わせないからね！

※ハード以上、50分以内Sランククリア"
